amendment.description: To strike the provision excluding the budgetary effects of the Act from PAYGO requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1116 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 58. Record Vote Number: 139.

action.text: Amendment SA 1116 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S2158; text: CR S2158) To strike the provision excluding the budgetary effects of the Act from PAYGO requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1116 proposed by Senator Lee.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1116 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 58. Record Vote Number: 139.
